title: Back to School
detail_text: <:th_ch0209/>So winter break’s over now, huh.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Yeah. But going back to school isn’t a bad thing. I get to listen to the other girls in my class talk about our most recent performances.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>The recent μ’s live was really good. I’m looking forward to seeing another one sometime.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Thanks. How was your first day back to school, Rina?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>One of the girls in my class brought me a souvenir. She said she went traveling over the break.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Is it that keychain you’ve got hanging on your bag?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Yes. I really like it.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>It looks like a design you’d like. I think it’s cute.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Thank you. Rina-chan board says, “Warm and fuzzy~”<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Hmhm, I’m glad you like it.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
